title: Revert breaking frontend change to restore successful deployment and Valentine flow

requirements.summary: Revert the latest breaking change so the Preview deploys successfully and the 5-step Valentine proposal flow works end-to-end without console issues.
acceptanceCriteria: Deployment completes successfully with no build/deploy errors.
The Valentine proposal flow is navigable through all 5 steps end-to-end.
The final step heading renders and reads exactly "So Shruti ❤️....".
No console errors or warnings are present in the Preview during normal interaction.

file_operations.description: Revert/remove the recent change that introduces the current deployment failure (e.g., remove the new icon-library import/usage) while keeping the Memories step UI and behavior intact. Continue using the shadcn-ui Button component for actions; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Update/confirm the checklist items relevant to the reverted change (Memories step rendering, upload/reset interactions, no console errors) to match the restored working implementation.
